name: firebuilder
description: Firefox profile, themes, userCSS and userChrome builder

scripts.build: bun build --compile ./cli.js --outfile dist/firebuilder-creator-darwin-arm64 --target bun-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile ./cli.js --outfile dist/firebuilder-creator-darwin-x64 --target bun-darwin-x64 && bun build --compile ./cli.js --outfile dist/firebuilder-creator-linux-x64 --target bun-linux-x64 && bun build --compile ./cli.js --outfile dist/firebuilder-creator-linux-arm64 --target bun-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile ./cli.js --outfile dist/firebuilder-creator-windows-x64 --target bun-windows-x64
